alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:20AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, western Baker, northern Columbia, east central Suwannee, southeastern Hamilton, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and south central Charlton Counties through NOON EDT... At 1119 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Fargo to Wellborn. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Taylor, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Olustee and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
